name: Merge Rush
description:
Only the strongest survive on the merging road! Take part in crazy survival races. Drive your motorcycle, buggy and muscle car at high speed. Outrun opponents and merge to become stronger. Substitute your opponents, but don't forget to keep an eye on your HP bar. Show who is the real road warrior here!
You get:
+ insane merge races in a realistic setting
+ the ability to manage three types of transport
+ cunning opponents, ready to do anything to win
+ adrenaline-filled gameplay and tons of cool emotions from the game!
